array: You are Magnus Highchurch. You have been sent here to recover the Temporal Chalice.
The Temporal Chalice is an object that can control time itself.
You are entering a place where time is sick. You cannot exit until you find the chalice and use it to fix the time in this area.
We are not sure of what you will find inside.
But keep in mind the importance of what you are about to do.
